Title: Harmony
Plot: In an effort to get more time off to search for his wife and kids, Tommy joins the new firehouse?s Barbershop Quartet.  Meanwhile back at the old station, Lou and Chief Reilly conspire to get Tommy back, but the rest of the crew has grown fond of his replacement.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Kristina  Klebe,  Reginald  Veneziano,  Lee Tergesen,  James Biberi,  Robert Turano,  Judy Del Giudice,  David Vadim,  Rob Munk,  John Speredakos,  Myk Watford,  Lou  Patane,  Adam  Mastrelli,  Tony Cucci
